summary: This module implements the core entry points for launching a Flet application. It determines the execution environment, prepares assets and upload directories, configures the appropriate renderer (desktop, web, or embedded), starts the necessary server or runtime, and wires up lifecycle callbacks such as startup, session creation, event handling, and graceful shutdown.
business_intent: Provide developers with a unified, high‑level API to run Flet UI applications seamlessly on desktop, web browsers, or embedded platforms, handling all underlying setup, server management, and event coordination automatically.
